name: Destroy The Destroyer V1.1 (mini game)
description:
The Game

The emperor ship of the re-united universe galactic fleet is the Destroyer.
It poses a great threat to the autonomous systems and their inhabitants.
It must be immediately destroyed!

News - V1.1 21.05.18

The game has been updated to be also playable using the keyboard. The use of a Xbox 360 game controller is no longer mandatory.

The auto-targeting algorithm has been rewritten to provide a more accurate target selection.

System requirements

This game has been designed to be played with a MS Xbox 360 game controller. Moreover, the game is entirely playable with the keyboard.

This version of the game should run on:
Windows 7, 8 & 10

The game may require the latest MS Visual Studio redistributable runtime.
The DLLs can be found at:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2977003/the-latest-supported-visual-c-d...

Project information

Game art & code
(c) Frédéric Meslin / Fred's Lab 2018
